complex geometry: Kev kawm txog cov qauv geometric thiab cov qauv tsim tawm los ntawm, lossis piav qhia los ntawm, cov lej nyuaj
cov zauv: Cov lej ntawm daim ntawv a + bi qhov twg a thiab b yog cov lej tiag
qhov tiag: Lub sij hawm nyob rau hauv ib tug complex tooj uas tsis muaj lub tswv yim chav tsev raws li ib tug yam
xav txog ib feem: Ib feem ntawm tus lej complex uas muaj qhov xav txog chav tsev ua qhov tseem ceeb
complex manifolds: Qhov chaw nyob rau hauv complex geometry uas yog generalizations ntawm nkhaus thiab nto
complex algebraic ntau yam: Qhov chaw nyob rau hauv complex geometry uas yog kev daws rau polynomial sib npaug
holomorphic kev tsim kho: Tsim nyob rau hauv complex geometry uas yog complex-differentiable
yam tsawg kawg nkaus qauv program: Ib qho kev pab cuam nyob rau hauv complex geometry rau kev faib tawm ntawm complex manifolds thiab complex algebraic ntau yam
moduli chaw: Qhov chaw nyob rau hauv complex geometry uas parameterise ib co hom geometric khoom
calabi conjecture: Ib qho kev xav hauv cov duab geometry nyuaj ua pov thawj los ntawm Shing-Tung Yau txog lub neej ntawm ib hom kev ntsuas tshwj xeeb ntawm ib qho kev sib txuam
hitchin-kobayashi sau ntawv: Ib qho kev sib txuas lus hauv cov geometry nyuaj ntawm qhov ruaj khov holomorphic vector bundles thiab cov kev daws teeb meem rau qee qhov sib txawv sib txawv
nonabelian hodge ntawv xov xwm: Ib qho kev sib txuas lus nyob rau hauv complex geometry ntawm tej hom complex manifolds thiab tej yam algebraic qauv
kahler-einstein metrics: Cov hom kev ntsuas tshwj xeeb ntawm ib qho kev sib txuam ua ke uas ua kom tau raws li qhov xwm txheej
